title: 100stacks
author: 100stacks
content: Im considering selling my 2014 Kialara I had for years but havent got a clue how much I can sell it for. This piece is quite unique one of a kind as you know so its hard for me to put a price tag on it. I know what I paid in 2014 but now after 8 years its worth much more I guess. What you guys think any sugestions ?

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: 100stacks on September 17, 2022, 08:35:10 PMIm considering selling my 2014 Kialara I had for years but havent got a clue how much I can sell it for. This piece is quite unique one of a kind as you know so its hard for me to put a price tag on it. I know what I paid in 2014 but now after 8 years its worth much more I guess. What you guys think any sugestions ?My advice is to:1. Make some pictures of that coin, upload them onto imgur.com and add the link(s) here.2. Move this topic into Collectibles ( https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=217.0 ) [the bottom-left link should work], those guys know this and some may not care of anything else from this forum.

comments.author: light_warrior
comments.body: On ebay sell for $3,999.95 2014 KIALARA Physical Bit coin - #354/2500 - Extremely RARE - BRAND NEW | eBayhttps://www.ebay.com/itm/284581322819

This piece is quite unique one of a kind as you know so its hard for me to put a price tag on it. I know what I paid in 2014 but now after 8 years its worth much more I guess. What you guys think any sugestions ?My advice is to:1. Make some pictures of that coin, upload them onto imgur.com and add the link(s) here.2. Move this topic into Collectibles ( https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=217.0 ) [the bottom-left link should work], those guys know this and some may not care of anything else from this forum.Thank you for your advice,heres the picture https://imgur.com/a/M5bugBSI might as well move this topic where it should be as you say

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Always loved kialaras - never bought them when they were affordable - now they are a fortune Will be watching the ebay listing to see where this one ends up at.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Quote from: light_warrior on September 17, 2022, 08:41:35 PMOn ebay sell for $3,999.95 2014 KIALARA Physical Bit coin - #354/2500 - Extremely RARE - BRAND NEW | eBayhttps://www.ebay.com/itm/284581322819   I agree 4k on ebay right now. But i say put it back in the safe and sell it for 20k in the year 2030. Im guessing it would sell for 0.08- 0.1 here

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: You also have to factor in how Bitcoin will appreciate. Say BTC is $500,000 by 2030, and the Kialara's are going for $20,000, that means you'd only get .04 BTC, instead of over .1 BTC today... something worth pondering.Best,

comments.author: 100stacks
comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on September 17, 2022, 09:43:01 PMBeautiful, is it funded?Unfunded

comments.author: krogoth
comments.body: Quote from: 100stacks on September 19, 2022, 01:35:08 PMQuote from: Hookzup1 on September 17, 2022, 09:43:01 PMBeautiful, is it funded?Unfunded     I remember when I funded mine in 2017 prefork....Max once told me    The only way to redeem the funds is to break open the case... these are designed to hold funds long term and ride out the highs and lows.       So it's a sure good way for me to hodl looong term

comments.author: 123Dave
comments.body: I would be interested but would require a 3rd party transaction

comments.author: 100stacks
comments.body: Quote from: 123Dave on September 20, 2022, 12:04:54 AMI would be interested but would require a 3rd party transactionSure, we can use any reputable escrow provider here, whats your offer

comments.author: SatsLife
comments.body: Hard to say. But these will only get harder to come by. $4k would have to become normal pricing if more of these are to find the market imo.

comments.author: 100stacks
comments.body: Deal with 123Dave didn't go through unfortunately so still available if anyone is interested let me know. Escrow, sending within EU only
